  3. JUJU SECRET

Park Jin-Joo

Mijoo

Introduction

JUJU SECRET (Korean: 주주 시크릿) is a project female duo formed through the MBC variety show Hangout with Yoo. They debuted on March 25, 2023 with their first single, "Lonely Night" and held their debut stage on the same day on Show! Music Core. Their name is derived from each of the member's name, which both had "Joo" in it, and a reference to the children's show Secret Jouju.
